Angular 15 HttpClient for Sending Http Request Example - ItSolutionStuff.com

  • {{ post.length }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PostService } from './post.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { posts:any; constructor(private service:PostService) {} ngOnInit() { this.service.getPosts() .subscribe(response => { this.posts = response; }); } }
